title: OVERWATCH
body: Why most people in my Friend lists was inactive lately!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Queues are much longer in LoL @ the moment because of overwatch I reckon.

and I just got a chat ban because of toxic - looked through the log and 2 games out of the 3 had trolls and the third the aDC counterpicked themself and hilarity ensued.

not complaining. it is what it is. But right now the population left in LoL is making it hard to enjoy the game either because they are trolls or just not very good. But the ban and the general state of play with the lower population is nudging me to overwatch too.
